name: Living with Construct 2 Episode 2
description: OH MY GOODNESS GUYS,  My stomach is growling from eating that onion and rotten garlic sa- oh my goodness. OK guys this is episode 2. And right now guys i want to show you my living room... Uh, my hallway i guess- OH my goodness my stomach. But um... Look guys look! It's one of my greatest achievement: Wario Land 4 on the gameboy advance, Hahaha. And look guys look, the Virtual Boy. Ultimate classic system.
